projects.title: Gratitude Journal
projects.bodyText: A gratitude journal is a type of journal where one often writes down the things one is thankful for so that they can focus on the positive things in their life and feel a sense of gratitude and gratitude.

projects.title: Task Tracking System
projects.bodyText: Task tracking systems are applications that are used to divide what needs to be done in a project into small tasks, assign these tasks to the people who need to do them, and to ensure that everything is completed on time by determining the deadlines for the tasks to be completed.

projects.title: Redux Movies
projects.bodyText: A web application with a small database of movies for adding new movies and adding existing movies to favourites.
